title: Privacy Policy
introduction: Igiti Enterprises (“we,” “our,” or “us”) respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your information when you interact with our products, services, and website.

items: Name, email address, phone number, and shipping/billing address when you place an order.
Payment details for transaction purposes (processed securely).
Feedback or inquiries submitted through our website or email.
IP address, browser type, operating system, and other technical information when you access our website.
Cookies and tracking technologies to improve user experience.
If you use social media to interact with us, we may collect publicly available information from your profile.
Process payments and deliver purchased products.
Communicate with you about your order status.
Analyze user behavior to enhance website performance.
Respond to your inquiries and requests.
Send marketing emails or updates if you’ve subscribed to our newsletter (you may opt out anytime).
Shipping companies, payment processors, and IT service providers to facilitate our operations.
If required by law, to comply with legal obligations or to protect our rights.

subsections.content: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience. These small data files are stored on your device and help us remember your preferences.
You can disable cookies through your browser settings, but some features of our website may not function properly without them.

sections.heading: 5. Data Retention
sections.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law.

subsections.content: Request access to or correction of your personal information.
Request the deletion of your data, subject to legal and operational obligations.
Unsubscribe from marketing communications at any time.

sections.heading: 7. Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, loss, or misuse. However, no system is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

sections.heading: 8. Third-Party Links
sections.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these websites. Please review their privacy policies before providing any personal data.

sections.heading: 9. Updates to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on our website and become effective immediately upon posting.

acknowledgment: By using Igiti Enterprises’ website and services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to this Privacy Policy.
